results.title: Erythrocyte-derived microvesicles induce arterial spasms in JAK2V617F myeloproliferative neoplasm

results.title: Simvastatin promotes angiogenesis and prevents microvascular remodeling in chronic renal ischemia.
results.text_hl: Single-kidney hemodynamics and function were quantified using electron-beam-computed tomography (CT) in normocholesterolemic @SPECIES_9823 @@@pigs@@@ after 12 wk of experimental @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@RAS@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@RAS@@@ supplemented with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@RAS@@@+@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@), and normal controls.

results.title: Ticagrelor Leads to Statin-Induced Rhabdomyolysis: A Case Report
results.text_hl: The combination of @CHEMICAL_Ticagrelor @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077486 @@@ticagrelor@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ poses a risk for @DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@ even with low-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, as shown in this case report.

results.title: Antiapoptotic Effect of Simvastatin Ameliorates Myocardial Ischemia/Reperfusion Injury
results.text_hl: Group (1): sham group: @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ underwent the same anesthetic and surgical procedures as those in the control group except ligation of LAD coronary @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@artery@@@, group (2): control group: @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were subjected to regional @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ for 25 min and reperfusion for 2 hours by ligation of LAD coronary @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@artery@@@, group (3): control vehicle group: @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ received vehicle of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ (normal saline) via IP injection and were subjected to regional @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ for 25 min and reperfusion for 2 hours by ligation of LAD coronary @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@artery@@@, group (4): @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ treated group: @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were pretreated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ 1 mg/kg i.p. 1 hr before ligation of LAD coronary @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@artery@@@.

citations.NLM: Hadi NR, Al-Amran F, Yousif M, Zamil ST. Antiapoptotic Effect of Simvastatin Ameliorates Myocardial Ischemia/Reperfusion Injury ISRN Pharmacol. 2013 Dec 19;2013():815094. PMID: 24455299

results.title: Simvastatin abates development of renal fibrosis in experimental renovascular disease.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ upregulates inhibitors of transforming growth factor-beta signaling, attenuates epithelial-to-mesenchymal transition, and decreases @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@renal fibrosis@@@ in @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@ + @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@renal artery stenosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Chade AR, Zhu XY, Grande JP, Krier JD, Lerman A, Lerman LO. Simvastatin abates development of renal fibrosis in experimental renovascular disease. J Hypertens. 2008 Aug;26(8):1651-60. PMID: 18622245

results.title: Simvastatin treatment duration and cognitive preservation in experimental subarachnoid hemorrhage.
results.text_hl: Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 10 mg/kg/d (SV10), @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 1.5 mg/kg/d, or vehicle on rotarod, Morris water maze, neuronal survival, cerebral @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@arterial@@@ diameter, and rCBF were determined by a blinded observer (n=15/group).

results.title: Temporal gene expression analysis of human coronary artery endothelial cells treated with Simvastatin.
results.text_hl: Further in-depth analysis of this effect may shed light on molecular mechanisms of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Sim@@@'s beneficial inhibition of neointima formation in the @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@atherosclerotic artery stenosis@@@.

results.title: Recovery of normal hemodynamic activities after long-term medication in a patient with left internal carotid arterial occlusion.
results.text_hl: Long-term treatment with @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Cilostazol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077407 @@@cilostazol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Nateglinide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077715 @@@nateglinide@@@ might help increase CBF in some @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@intracranial arterial stenosis@@@.
